Articles.Content:
This thread is for drawing\'s and sketches YOU drew.

Anyways this is one i drew when i got bored in my free time

Warning Pony and large image alert
I\'d give all you pages of artwork and concept art from my school rough book, but I don\'t have a scanner. D:
[mod]Nope, this thread will not be used as a sneaky way to post pony material outside of the pony megathread, you know where this stuff belongs.[/mod]
